name: Lottie Dottie Chicken
description: You cant stand Wheels on a bus anymore? Try Lottie Dottie Chickens lovely songs. Nursery rhymes and educational songs that teach kids how good it is to sing and learn. Safe environment. KidSAFE Certified.  Download your favourite songs and watch whenever you want, even when offline!   Features ************ + New Galinha Mini! 26 videos in Portuguese - Including 2 free + 15 NEW clips in English with Lottie Dottie Chicken 3 - Including 1 FREE + 41 clips in English with Lottie Dottie Chicken - Including 3 FREE + 40 clips in Spanish with Gallina Pintadita - Including 3 FREE + 57 clips in Portuguese with Galinha Pintadinha - Including 4 FREE + Perfect for long trips, waiting rooms and tantrum relief + Keep your child entertained anywhere, anytime. Even when offline + Child-friendly interface + Playlist: keep your child occupied without having to start new videos + Images to collect, paint, play with puzzles and share + Watch on Chromecast + Buy once and get access in all Android devices (smartphone and tablet) + Sing together and have fun with your family and friends   More than 20 million apps downloaded. More than 3 billion views on YouTube. 1.5 million DVDs solded. The Brazilian kids phenomenon!  Enjoy it and lots of cluck cluck cluck for everyone!    Created by Bromlia Filminhos www.lottiedottiechicken.com/  Published by 01 Digital www.01digital.com.br
